title: 12: S5E12 – "Alien Intentions" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four extraordinarily terrifying tales from authors N. Christ, Joshua L. Hood, B.T. Joy, and SpookFox, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about extraterrestrial transmissions, alien entertainment, insidious institutions, and imminent extinction – all of them themed around the idea that there’s got to be more than mankind living in this universe of ours, and that not all of that life may be benevolent.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
